entry.title: 24 Oras News Alert: Thunderstorms expected over Mindanao as Ambo slightly intensifies—PAGASA

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras News Alert: Thunderstorms expected over Mindanao as Ambo slightly intensifies—PAGASA
media:group.media:description:
State weather bureau PAGASA on Monday said the trough of Tropical Depression Ambo will bring scattered light to moderate with isolated heavy rains during thunderstorms over Mindanao.
